text: Buiksloot is a former village in the Dutch province of North Holland. It is now a neighbourhood of Amsterdam-Noord. Buiksloot was a separate municipality until 1921, when it was merged with Amsterdam. ==Notable people from Buiksloot== *M.H. Laddé, photographer and director of the first Dutch film ==References== ==External links== * Map of the former municipality, around 1868. Category:Former municipalities of North Holland Category:Amsterdam-Noord Category:Neighbourhoods of Amsterdam
title: Buiksloot
